version_description:
Would be awesome if there was syntax highlighting, right? Well now there is!

This update introduces:
- syntax highlighting
- search
- slight design changes

... also fixed a bunch (not all, this app has no chill) of annoying crashes.

If you would like to provide me with your feedback or report a problem you're experiencing, it's best to tweet me @r00m

TL;DR bug fixes for search

You will not believe this, but if you search for something, it will (probably) find something. For real!

- Fixed syntax highlighting (I promise)
- Search results are now highlighted
- Possible to navigate between search items
- Total count of search results is displayed

Shoutout to @BobbyBabes for reporting bugs on Twitter and sorry it took only 3 years to fix them >:D

Another round of bug fixes for search functionality... at this point I've lost all hope and I'm not even sure it will ever work as it used to. RIP.

In other news - dropped support for iOS 8 and did some ground work for shiny new features! \o/
